headline: EA shares down pre-market as Stifel downgrades to 'hold' on valuation concerns
summary: Analysts at Stifel maintained their positive view on EA's long-term fundamentals but noted limited short-term upside for the stock, which has already delivered a strong 15% year-to-date return in 2024, including dividends.  EA's valuation—currently at 19.5 times next-twelve-month earnings—has approached levels that Stifel deems less compelling, as per Stifel.
